'N.A.E.B. News Letter April 1, 1939 Pap;e 3
The City of New York (WNYC) seeks the right to rebroadcast certain pro¬
grams of high frequency and international broadcast stations which may
not be done under the Commission’s existing rules* To this end it seeks
an amendment of the rules so as to permit rebroadoasts of this charac¬
ter where the licensees of regular broadcast stations making the rebroad?^
casts are universities, other educational institutions* municipalities,
other Government agencies of other non-commercial, non-profit organiza¬
tions.
